snippet.title: Londonian Gothics trailer
snippet.description: Trailer for the Nintendo DS game Londonian Gothics. You play as Alice trying to rescue her father from a dungeon under a mansion. At the start of each dungeon level you cant defeat the monsters there so you have to avoid them, you are however helped by the abilities you get while wearing variuos dresses. By collecting dress patterns and finding conveniently placed sewing machines you can create new dresses that gives you abilities such as shrinking, teleporting or summoning lightning bolts to stunn monsters, etc. To kill the monsters you must first find and destroy all glowing red spheres in the level, after that you can fell the monsters and shuffel kick them to death. The game was developed by Megacyber, a cell phone company.
